name: Secret Six Samurai - Fuma
text: If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Six Samurai" monster from your Deck, except "Shadow Six Samurai - Fuhma". If exactly 1 "Six Samurai" monster you control (and no other cards) would be destroyed by a card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.
